metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7586 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
In libsndfile before 1.0.28, an error in the "header_read()" function (common.c) when handling ID3 tags can be exploited to cause a stack-based buffer overflow via a specially crafted FLAC file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7586` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsndfile1 - 1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.1
sndfile-programs - 1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsndfile package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.1').
